summary: Chutki (Antara Mali) lives in a small village community in Central India, and has developed a talent of mimicing bollywood actress Madhuri Dixit in every aspect. Her friend, Raja alias ... See full summary »
cast: Antara Mali|Rajpal Yadav|Asif Basra|Rita Bhaduri|K.D. Chandran|Benjamin Gilani|Govind Namdeo|Sudhir Pandey|Sunita Rajwar|Seema Shinde|Raman Trikha|Manish Vatssalya|Yogendra Singh Waldia
title: Main Madhuri Dixit Banna Chahti Hoon!
